metadata.description: A curated marketplace of Claude Code plugins for agentic development workflows, featuring tools for architecture, knowledge management, and development automation

plugins.name: planning
plugins.description: Comprehensive planning tools including plan and execplan skills with automatic keyword detection via hooks. Creates implementation plans and execution plans following proven methodologies.

plugins.name: consultant
plugins.description: Flexible multi-provider LLM consultations using Python/LiteLLM - includes consultant agent, review/bug-investigation/execplan commands, and consultant skill for deep AI-powered code analysis across 100+ models with custom base URL support

plugins.name: prompt-engineering
plugins.description: Tools for crafting, refining, and improving LLM prompts - includes update-prompt command for balanced prompt optimization that avoids overfitting

plugins.name: vibe-workflow
plugins.description: Vibe coding workflow - autonomous development agents for implementation, code review, test coverage auditing, bug fixing, and maintainability checks with quality gates

plugins.name: solo-dev
plugins.description: Toolkit for solo developers to build, manage, and grow their business - content creation, personal branding, productivity, and more
